issue.title: [R] typo in python.r
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13418](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13418). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/r/R/python.R#L174

Should be:
```Java

 RecordBatchReader$import_from_c(stream_ptr)
```

comments.body:
